name: Rock n' Roll
description:
Click whichever number drum the dice rolls! The timer will shrink every time, so be careful not to get too relaxed when playing :)

all art, coding, design, & music is by me
i found the drum & cymbal sounds on myinstants

made in 48h for gmtk 2022 game jam

(also it isnt really a rhythm game but i dont know what else to tag it as)
